title: HOUSE ON HAUNTED HILL widescreen & video quality upgrade

sources.title: HouseOnHauntedHillWidescreenVideoUpgrade
sources.description: This is the original true-widescreen theatrical release. The glitch-free print is significantly sharper than the other prints here at IA. Vincent Price throws a hell of a old dark house party in this classic horror helped along by William Castle's gimmicks. Campy fun. Directed by William Castle Released in 1959 Complete print
